question:
Many, if not most, sociologists subscribe to the idea that humans are $\(\qquad\)$ but the public reaction to the Ebola outbreak so mirrors the flailing hysteria recorded during the medieval plague outbreaks that it could be concluded that human nature is largely immutable.
Two Answers
A. homogenous
B. heterogeneous
C. malleable
D. monolithic
E. pliant
F. variegated
